subject: Upgrade Options: Can I Get a Discount on a Premium Model?
body:
Hi,

I've had my BreezeLite BLD-150 for about 5 months now and it's been fantastic. However, I'm interested in upgrading to one of your professional models like the BLD-2000 Pro-Salon.

Do you offer any trade-in programs or discounts for existing customers who want to upgrade? I'd be willing to send my current dryer back if there's a trade-in value.

What's the best way to handle this?

Thanks,
Thomas Wilson
thomas.wilson@email.com
